tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE inter_chain_transactions (
    transaction_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    sender_address VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    receiver_address VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    amount NUMERIC NOT NULL,
    transaction_time TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE inter_chain_transactions (
    transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sender_address VARCHAR(255),
    receiver_address VARCHAR(255),
    amount DECIMAL,
    transaction_time TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE atomic_swaps (
    swap_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    initiator_address VARCHAR(255),
    participating_address VARCHAR(255),
    swap_amount DECIMAL,
    swap_status VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE inter_chain_transactions (
    transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    from_chain VARCHAR(255),
    to_chain VARCHAR(255),
    amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE atomic_swaps (
    swap_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    participant1 VARCHAR(255),
    participant2 VARCHAR(255),
    asset_type VARCHAR(50),
    amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE transaction_history (
    history_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    transaction_type VARCHAR(50),
    transaction_id INT,
    swap_id INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (transaction_id) REFERENCES inter_chain_transactions(transaction_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (swap_id) REFERENCES atomic_swaps(swap_id)
);

CREATE TABLE InterChainTransactions (
    transaction_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    sender_chain VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    receiver_chain VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    amount DECIMAL NOT NULL,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE AtomicSwaps (
    swap_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    initiator VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    acceptor VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    swap_amount DECIMAL NOT NULL,
    status VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE interchain_transactions (
    transaction_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    from_chain VARCHAR(50),
    to_chain VARCHAR(50),
    amount DECIMAL,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE atomic_swaps (
    swap_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    initiator_address VARCHAR(50),
    recipient_address VARCHAR(50),
    swap_amount DECIMAL,
    status VARCHAR(20),
    start_time TIMESTAMP,
    expiry_time TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE transaction_details (
    transaction_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    sender_address VARCHAR(50),
    receiver_address VARCHAR(50),
    amount DECIMAL,
    description TEXT,
    transaction_time TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE swap_history (
    swap_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    initiator_address VARCHAR(50),
    recipient_address VARCHAR(50),
    swap_amount DECIMAL,
    status VARCHAR(20),
    action_time TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE chain_info (
    chain_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    chain_name VARCHAR(50),
    chain_type VARCHAR(50)
);
